features: 12 PLACE SETTINGS - E-far 60pcs stainless steel silverware set comes with 12 of each: Dinner Fork, Dinner Spoon, Dinner Knife, Teaspoon and Salad Fork, Dishwasher safe eating utensils
STAINLESS STEEL SILVERWARE - Made of high quality 18/0 stainless steel to ensure solid construction and sturdiness, Rust resistance and nickel free, Healthy and durable for everyday use
HAMMERED DESIGN - Stylish hammered design on the front side of each square handles, Mirror finish always keep shiny, Modern and elegant flatware complements most tableware, Elevates dining experience
FINE WORKMANSHIP - Smooth edges without rough spots, Medium weight for comfortable grip, Not too heavy and not flimsy, Designed sharp serrated blade knives can easily cut meats
VERSATILE - 12 place settings silverware can last for a long time under proper care, Perfect for home daily use, restaurant, hotel, Suitable for wedding, party, catering, Also as a decent gift

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: E-far 60-Piece Hammered Silverware Set - Made of high quality stainless steel, rust resistance - Mirror polished surface with hammered pattern - Suitable for any formal or casual occassions

STAINLESS STEEL SILVERWARE Made of high quality 18/0 stainless steel to ensure solid construction and sturdiness, Rust resistance and nickel free 12 Place Settings 18/0 Stainless Steel Rust Resistance Dishwasher Safe Mirror Finished Healthy & Durable Proper Thickness Medium Weight E-far Hammered Stainless Steel Flatware Set Versatile Stainless Steel Silverware Set Perfect Daily Use Silverware: Constructed by high quality stainless steel, this flatware set is rust free and durable for everyday use. Great bargain of 60pcs large quantity.Suitable for Different Occasions: Special hammered design on each handles, suitable for any casual or formal occasions. Hammered design blends with any decor, creats an attractive visual contrast.Decent Gift for Family and Friends: Great choice as a gift for lovely family and friends on different festivals. MODERN STYLE - Stylish hammered design on the front side of each square handles, Mirror finish always keep shiny, Elegant flatware complements most tableware FINE WORKMANSHIP - Smooth edges without rough spots, Medium weight for comfortable grip, Not too heavy and not flimsy

Smooth Edges Smooth edges with no rough spots. Proper deep for easy scooping soup or rice. Nice weight and comfortable in use. Mirror finished for easy cleaning. Four Tines Forks Four tines forks are smooth won't hurt your mouth while be able to poke food easily. Ergonomic design handles for comfortable grip by both adults and big childrens. Serrated Sharp Blades Solid constructed by 18/0 hard stainless steel to ensure sharpness. Serrated blades are sharp enough to cut meat and steak. Sharp than gengeral butter knives. Hammered Square Handles Designed square edge ends handles. Stylish hammered design on the front side of each handle. Contemporary design flatware complements most any décor.

SPECIFICATION - Package Contents: 8.9 inches Dinner Knife x 12 7.9 inches Dinner Spoon x 12 7.9 inches Dinner Fork x 12 6.7 inches Salad Fork x 12 6.7 inches Tea Spoon x 12 - Warmly Remind: The serrated blade of dinner knife is designed sharper than usual butter knife, please be careful when using it and keep it away from kids. Healthy Stainless Steel Eating Utensils FIRST TIME USE 1. Please hand wash your new silverware thoroughly using a mild soap or detergent to wash off any processing residue left from manufacturing. 2.Rinse with fresh water and dry immediately with a soft cloth. EVERYDAY USE 1. Please clean and dry the flatware after use and store in dry place for its durability. 2. Please do not use steel wool, scouring pads or sharp objects to avoid scratches. 3. Please do not leave silverware with residual salt for a long time as it may increases the chances of discoloration and corrosion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love em! Nickel free stainless steel!
reviews.reviewText: These "feel" good in your hand when you hold them. They are super solid (no bend).Very pleased with my new flatware!Great price (think I paid around $25 plus tax for 40 piece set). They look fancy too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for something more heavy than normal I was looking for something differentI was looking for something elegant I was looking for something not too priceythis product gave me everything I was looking for a recommended this product they’re great looking and look like they are very pricey I recommend this seller it was very well packed there was no damage on my product and it was a fast delivery on the front of my door

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This flatware set is exactly what I was looking for at half the price. Beautiful, sturdy and such a nice presentation to any table setting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty utensil set
reviews.reviewText: I bought these as a Christmas gift for my daughter who desperately needed some and these were perfect. I love the hammer little markings which make them look fancy but also every day. I'll probably get her the food serving set to match.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice design
reviews.reviewText: I wish they were heavierI wonder how to keep it shine?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good so far
reviews.reviewText: Only starting using a couple of weeks ago but the set looks lovely. Good weight, not too light nor too heavy and feels good in the hand. I hope this flatware will look as nice over time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE LOVE LOVE
reviews.reviewText: Excellent quality and durability. Comes out of the dishwasher nicely. Pattern makes them seem so much more expensive. Excellent price for the quality you get. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Das besteck sieht wie auf den Bildern aus. Der Versand war schnell und unkompliziert..sieht wirklich edel aus... ich bestelle gern erneut
The cutlery is awesome. Delivery was so quick.

Ordered to get daily use dishwasher safe cutlery. This looks good and is functional but some of the smaller fork tines bent in the dishwasher and are quite sharp so need to be cognisant of that and be careful to check and throw those. Since the rest of the set is fine I didn't return it..
Flatware set is very well made, sturdy and pretty as well!
